abstract: General Electric is seriously considering selling GE Consumer Finance, a Japanese unit that offers financial services, and may invite bids as early as September, according to the Nikkei business daily.
lead_paragraph: General Electric is seriously considering selling GE Consumer Finance, a Japanese unit that offers financial services, and may invite bids as early as September, according to the Nikkei business daily.

headline.main: G.E. Said to Consider Sale of Japanese Unit
